name: Institutional Limited Partners Association
memberOrga: ILPA does not provide a public list of its member organizations, however, a review of our Board of Directors is illustrative of our membership: https://ilpa.org/who-we-are/board-of-directors/
goal: The members of the Institutional Limited Partners Association (ILPA) are the investment professionals within more than 500 organizations invested in the private equity asset class, including Public and Private Pensions, Endowments and Foundations, Family Offices, Sovereign Funds, and Insurance Companies. The mission of ILPA is to support its members on issues relating to private equity by providing advocacy, education, research and promoting communication on issues relating to the asset class.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Policy and regulatory initiatives that relate specifically to institutional investors' investments into private equity funds, with particular focus on the Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive (AIFMD).
